name: ALL INDIA ASSOCIATION FOR WOMEN AND CHILD DEVELOPMENT

address: 162, Ankur Apartment, 7 I. P. Extension, Delhi - 110092

briefDescription: VISION Our primary vision is to ensure that the Marginalized / Under Privileged / Needy and Unreachable section of the society is given preferred and basic social quality like Food, Shelters, Health support and Education to a level so that they become socially and economically secured and lead a decent social life especially those who are Oppressed Women, Children, Construction Labour and Handicapped.Our vision is also to strengthen and protect the interest of such section of the society and of the SC/ST/OBC  by creating a social awareness among them and the general mass through Seminar, Debate, Skill Development Program and Vocational Training conducted by our organization or through a consortium of social organization or federation.
